user_action_and_explanation: Changing URL parameters. The current URL already specifies the check-in and check-out dates along with the city code for Rio de Janeiro. To view the hotel brands, the 'filterbrands' parameter is typically used on Booking.com to activate brand filters in search results. By appending '&filterbrands=1' to the URL, you instruct Booking.com to display options that include filtering by brand, allowing you to see which brand has the most or fewest hotels on the desired dates.
